title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 605.2 - Vehicles subject to inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 605.2 - Vehicles subject to inspection

State Regulations

Any vehicle, the load of which includes, or is believed by a
bridge employee to include, any dangerous article, and the load of any such
vehicle, shall be subject to inspection to determine whether any such vehicle
would be in violation of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
605.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
